DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study 1- detect quantify HCV-PI resistant mutant ultra-deep pyrosequencing ( UDPS ) technology , 2 - detect SNPs P-glyocoprotein CYP3A gene , HCV mono-infected patient under/after Telaprevir treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Factors Treatment Failure Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) Infected Patients Treated With Telaprevir
DOC.criteria: HCV monoinfected subject Age > 18 year HBV coinfection
